title: My LOL Client on Mac wont open
body:
So I've had lots of different issues with my League (On Mac) and stuff before you know because im so unlucky and have resolved most myself. However over the past 3 days I've had to uninstall and reinstall LOL 6 times and its not fun because it takes 3 hours and i didn't play all day on Saturday. 

The Problem: 
When i click my LOL launcher it bounces on the dock ONCE and sits down no Dot comes underneath it to show the application is opening/responding  and when i go into activity monitor it says : League Of Legends (not responding) i force quit it and keep trying yet nothing happens. I have seen the old solution (something about Userkernel) but we are on the new client and stuff is different so the files in - Show package contents - are unique to what they were like 2 years ago. I really need a fix because i cant enjoy league and it feels like a burden.

Thankyou in Advance {{champion:64}} , {{champion:238}}  Main xD

replies.body: Ahhhh that issue sounds like a case of your OS not having the right admin priveledges in place for League to be able to run properly. Permissions work a bit differently on Mac's but follow [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) and you should be able to get back in.
